nodes.text: B3-T4 was an R2-series astromech droid with blue and white plating. Active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, it was built by Industrial Automaton like all R-series astromech droids. B3-T4 stood at 0.96 meters tall.

B3-T4 first appeared as a purchasable companion for players in the MMORPG Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures released by Sony Online Entertainment in 2010. The droid was gifted to all players who participated in the game's beta, hence its name spelling out the word beta.
